short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your scrollbar orange if the word bitcoin is on the page!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't accidentally waste your time reading about altcoins. If your scrollbar doesn't turn orange, that means the word "bitcoin" is not on the page!
